title: SOLD: 1913 Fatima T200 - Boston Braves (NL) w/Rabbit Maranville (SGC Authentic)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1913 Fatima T200 - Boston Braves (NL) w/Rabbit Maranville (SGC Authentic)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is an extremely tough to find 1913 Fatima T200 - Boston Braves (NL) w/Rabbit Maranville graded SGC Authentic by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Please note that the bottom-left side and corner borders have been re-colored in a darker shade than the original brown borders. In spite of the imperfections, this card remains the single toughest of the T200 set. Sale price on this rarity is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
